education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Relevant coursework included Operating Systems, Networking, Distributed Systems, and Cloud Computing. Capstone project involved automating the deployment of a microservices application using Docker and Kubernetes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, resulting in a 30% reduction in deployment time.
Utilized AWS services such as EC2, S3, and Lambda for application deployment and scaling.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure the reliability and scalability of our platform, adopting DevOps best practices.
Monitored system performance using Prometheus and Grafana, proactively identifying and resolving potential issues.

experience.title: Intern Software Engineer
description: Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform, streamlining the onboarding process for new developers.
Assisted in the migration of legacy applications to a containerized environment using Docker and Kubernetes.
Contributed to the development of monitoring tools to track key performance indicators (KPIs).

projects.title: Automated Deployment Pipeline
projects.description: Designed and implemented a fully automated deployment pipeline using Jenkins and Docker, enabling continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD). Included automated testing and rollback capabilities.
projects.technologies: Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Bash, AWS
